pages.title: Stellum
pages.text: The raw energy of the stars, compressed into a small ingot. You can feel the power coursing through every molecule.$(p)Perhaps this could serve as some sort of power source?

pages.title: Obtaining Stellum
pages.text: $(item)Stellum Ore$() can be found inside $(thing)Asteroids$() in $(thing)Space$().$(p)Mining Stellum Ore will require an $(item)Asterite Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 5) or better, and canm be smelted into a single $(item)Stellum Ingot().

pages.title: Usages
pages.text: Stellum can be used to create $(thing)tools$() and $(thing)armor$() which are roughly equivalent to $(l:materials/asterite)Asterite$(). There are some benefits, and some drawbacks. Which you use is up to your preference.$(p)Perhaps in the future, its innate solar power could be harnessed...
